portfolio.title: Business Consultant
portfolio.description: Professional lead generation website for consulting services with optimized conversions.
portfolio.content: Built with integrated CRM and analytics for real-time lead tracking.

case_study.client: The client, a business consulting firm, struggled with low lead generation and poor user engagement on their outdated website.
case_study.solution: We developed a modern, mobile-first website with integrated CRM tools, real-time analytics, and a streamlined contact form. The design focused on clear calls-to-action and showcased client success stories.
results: 200% increase in qualified leads within 6 months
25% higher engagement on key service pages

portfolio.title: Coffee Shop
portfolio.description: Mobile-first website showcasing artisanal coffee products and subscription service.
portfolio.content: Integrated with POS system and loyalty program management.

case_study.client: The client, a local coffee shop, wanted to expand their online presence and increase subscription sales for their artisanal coffee products.
case_study.solution: We created a visually appealing website with an interactive product tour, seamless e-commerce integration, and a subscription management system. The site was optimized for mobile users and included social media integrations.

portfolio.title: Fashion
portfolio.description: E-commerce platform for a luxury fashion brand with virtual try-on features.
portfolio.content: Implemented AR-powered product visualization for enhanced engagement.

case_study.client: The client, a luxury fashion brand, faced high return rates and low online engagement due to a lack of interactive features.
case_study.solution: We developed an e-commerce platform with AR-powered virtual try-on features, 360Â° product views, and seamless checkout. The site also included a personalized recommendation engine.

portfolio.title: Boutique
portfolio.description: Elegant and responsive website for a boutique showcasing products and promotions.
portfolio.content: Designed with a focus on visual appeal and seamless shopping experience.

case_study.client: The client, a boutique retailer, struggled with low online sales and poor customer retention due to an outdated website.
case_study.solution: We redesigned the website with a modern, visually appealing layout, integrated email marketing tools, and a loyalty program. The site also featured a streamlined checkout process.
results: 150% increase in online sales during the first quarter

portfolio.title: Juice Shop
portfolio.description: Vibrant and refreshing website for a juice shop with online ordering capabilities.
portfolio.content: Integrated with delivery APIs for real-time order tracking.

case_study.client: The client, a juice shop, needed a website to handle online orders and improve customer engagement.
case_study.solution: We built a vibrant, mobile-friendly website with online ordering, real-time delivery tracking, and a loyalty rewards program. The site also included a blog for health tips and recipes.

portfolio.title: Babysitter
portfolio.description: Trustworthy and user-friendly website for babysitting services with booking functionality.
portfolio.content: Includes real-time availability tracking and secure payment integration.

case_study.client: The client, a babysitting service provider, faced challenges with manual booking processes and low customer trust.
case_study.solution: We developed a user-friendly website with real-time booking, secure payment integration, and a review system. The site also included a mobile app for on-the-go bookings.

portfolio.title: Doctors Office
portfolio.description: Professional and secure website for a medical practice with appointment scheduling.
portfolio.content: HIPAA-compliant with patient portal and telehealth integration.

case_study.client: The client, a medical practice, needed a secure and user-friendly website to manage appointments and patient communication.
case_study.solution: We developed a HIPAA-compliant website with an integrated patient portal, telehealth capabilities, and automated appointment reminders.

portfolio.title: Car Dealer
portfolio.description: Dynamic website for a car dealership with inventory management and test drive scheduling.
portfolio.content: Includes advanced search filters and vehicle comparison tools.

case_study.client: The client, a car dealership, struggled with low online engagement and inefficient inventory management.
case_study.solution: We built a dynamic website with advanced search filters, vehicle comparison tools, and integrated CRM for lead tracking. The site also featured a test drive scheduling system.

portfolio.title: Wedding Planner
portfolio.description: Elegant and romantic website for wedding planning services with portfolio showcase.

case_study.client: The client, a wedding planning service, needed a website to showcase their portfolio and attract new clients.
case_study.solution: We designed an elegant website with event galleries, client testimonials, and a package customization tool. The site also included a blog for wedding tips and trends.
results: 50+ weddings booked in the first year
